Technologies usedÂ¶

  • jQuery, jQueryUI, can.js for client side Javacript UI and MVC framework.
  • Jade for templates, Sass for CSS building.
  • Node.js, Express, Socket.IO for Web Server and Web Sockets.
  • RServe, R for statistics backends.
  • Sphinx, reStructuredText for documentation
  • Project’s repository
